import React from 'react' import { Col, Container, Form, Image, } from 'react-bootstrap' import bigStar from '../assets/bigStar.png' const DevicePage = () => { const device = {id: 1, name: "Iphone 12 pro", price: 25000, rating: 5, img: 'https://purposechurch.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/fpo400x300.png'} return (

{device.name}

{device.rating}
) } export default DevicePage
